desc: At Sassy Sapphire Boutique we are your one stop shop for all the things. We carry fashionable, trendy, cute & affordable boutique clothing, sizes ranging from xs-3xl, shoes, accessories, jewelry, unique household items & snacks. Watch us live Most evenings, cant wait to see you soon!!!

layout.text: Treat yourself to some yummy snacks and candy, you deserve a little indulgence!
